3bda9bf8-2c00-49b9-b4b9-7a1b74d9f0ef.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Empathy certification have completed the foundational training required to enhance their ability to feel into another’s experience and to effectively use that understanding to guide their actions.
3bda9bf8-2c00-49b9-b4b9-7a1b74d9f0ef.name: Power Skills - Empathy

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 4.4 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

a3540825-236c-48c0-a744-6835ada7ce04.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Learning Agility certification have completed the foundational training required to assess and increase their curiosity and confidence to learn and adapt in a constantly changing world.
a3540825-236c-48c0-a744-6835ada7ce04.name: Power Skills - Learning Agility

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 3.5 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

517ad673-a6ed-4d6f-836f-4e38fd6befc8.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Critical Thinking certification have completed the foundational training required to think clearly and rationally, understanding the logical connection between ideas and information, and to effectively use that information to guide their actions.
517ad673-a6ed-4d6f-836f-4e38fd6befc8.name: Power Skills - Critical Thinking

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 3 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

ec1f0b05-2dc4-4b9f-a1fd-f084164aca33.description: International Progams from Zurich (IPZ) certification is a designation that is earned by completion of a robust training program. Completion of this program indicates a solid understanding of how to craft, implement and maintain bespoke international solutions from Zurich.
ec1f0b05-2dc4-4b9f-a1fd-f084164aca33.name: IPZ International Programs from Zurich - Zurich Certified

badge_template_activities.title: The core program includes: 15 hours self-study and alignment to a Leadership / mentor; 15 hours in person classroom training (2-2.5 days); one to one skills assessments with a SME or trainer; and, International 2-hour exam.

In addition to the core program, U.S. Underwriters for International Large Property, International Large Casualty and International Middle Markets (Property, Liability, and “Other Lines”) must complete Level 2 courses (8 hours). These programs may include the following components depending on the individual program: Zurich Oxygen Learning activities; On the job activities; Other resources (documents, presentations, etc.).
Post training, earners work with Subject Matter Experts to apply skills learned in training and complete annual continuous development modules.

d1fef58e-2f4d-4c37-a735-684f1f7d6fe1.description: Earners of the Accelerate Manager Foundations credential have built the skills needed to lead their team and drive desired business outcomes. Skills include: empathy and self-awareness to identify their team members' strengths and talents and support their development; coaching, providing continuous feedback, recognition and motivating and empowering to drive their team's performance and results; and trust and fostering a sense of belonging to encourage employee engagement.
d1fef58e-2f4d-4c37-a735-684f1f7d6fe1.name: Accelerate Manager Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Satisfactory completion of all modules in the curriculum over 12 month timeframe.  The learning journey includes knowledge, skills, experiential learning, application, self reflection, and small group discussion and reflection.

b17df69b-7148-4ade-809e-8468b0738c92.description: Challenge is a leadership development program for Director, AVP and VP level leaders at ZNA. Earners of the Challenge Learning Journey credential have further developed the skills needed to lead their team and drive desired business outcomes.
b17df69b-7148-4ade-809e-8468b0738c92.name: Challenge Learning Journey

badge_template_activities.title: Satisfactory completion of 5 modules over 6 months. The learning journey includes knowledge, skills, experiential learning, application, self reflection, and small group discussion. Topics include: empathy and self-awareness to identify team members' strengths and talents, coaching, building trust, providing continuous feedback, communicating strategy through storytelling, developing high performing teams to maximize their teams performance, and growing self and team through development.

bc92ec83-3a9e-47f9-96e4-f182f5db9426.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Data Analytics certification have completed the foundational training required to use data to enhance critical thinking processes, understand root causes, and define and track solutions.
bc92ec83-3a9e-47f9-96e4-f182f5db9426.name: Power Skills - Data Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 4.2 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

9d99c1e2-042c-4137-8575-a29540392aa1.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Communication certification have completed the foundational training required to exchange information verbally, non-verbally, and visually to find understanding and meaning.
9d99c1e2-042c-4137-8575-a29540392aa1.name: Power Skills - Communication

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 4.5 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

6b181699-df42-451c-9c81-647636208c0d.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Cultural Competence certification have completed the foundational training required to develop self-awareness while actively acknowledging, understanding, valuing, and including diverse cultural contributions.
6b181699-df42-451c-9c81-647636208c0d.name: Power Skills - Cultural Competence

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 5.75 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

ea09721a-2233-4f97-b0c4-c45e9ced7f95.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Collaboration certification have completed the foundational training required to enable the learner to work across diverse teams, toward a common goal, through relationships built on trust.
ea09721a-2233-4f97-b0c4-c45e9ced7f95.name: Power Skills - Collaboration

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 5.75 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

861dc6b5-c04c-4c75-b3ca-c9e229bb9a83.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Digital Skills certification have completed the foundational training required to thrive in our digital society by using technology to access, manage, and share data and information.
861dc6b5-c04c-4c75-b3ca-c9e229bb9a83.name: Power Skills - Digital Skills

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 4.5 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

945eb9c0-0034-462c-8b45-74d5e1a947f7.description: Earners of the UTP badge have been introduced to the foundational concepts and terminology around The Zurich Way of Underwriting. UTP is designed for trainees new to insurance underwriting and blends individual completion of the Underwriting@Zurich on-demand curriculum with live interactive sessions designed to debrief and reinforce the curriculum. UTP is cohort based, providing trainees opportunities to network and build relationships within Zurich.
945eb9c0-0034-462c-8b45-74d5e1a947f7.name: Underwriter Training Program (UTP)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Underwriting@Zurich on-demand curriculum.

UTP is cohort based and lasts four weeks for the core curriculum, then sub-cohorts form to address content specific to line of business. Sub-cohort duration varies (typically 3-9 weeks) depending on line of business. Participants must attend all live sessions.

20e8e4c6-0c9b-4803-832e-d92f8f8e88fa.description: Power Skills are a combination of core cross-functional skills that are essential to employee success now and in the future. Earners of the Innovation certification have completed the foundational training required to create or enhance ideas, products or services to create value.
20e8e4c6-0c9b-4803-832e-d92f8f8e88fa.name: Power Skills - Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: The earner successfully completed a 6 hour self-paced learning journey to earn this badge.

cd43c2aa-7f64-4314-af33-39513421b1e7.description: Developed by St. John’s University Tobin School of Business and Zurich North America. MMRM designation earners have attained skills needed to understand and address the unique risk management and insurance programming needs of middle market organizations consisting of public and private enterprises, family-owned businesses and non-profits. These organizations generally have revenues of $50 million to $1 billion and at least 500 employees.
cd43c2aa-7f64-4314-af33-39513421b1e7.name: Middle Market Risk Manager (MMRM)

badge_template_activities.title: Prospective designees must attend and pass the nine module MMRM program and meet the defined professional experience requirement. Individuals who earn the designation are required to fulfill Continuing Education requirements to maintain designee status in good standing.

79728668-1f04-4b07-a213-b649deb03e96.description: Recognizes individuals or teams who have made a sustainable, long-term impact on our business outcomes.
79728668-1f04-4b07-a213-b649deb03e96.name: Excellence Award

badge_template_activities.title: Criteria includes: Alignment to strategy; Description of action taken; Outcome/achievement created long-term, substantial impact; Proof points and metrics to demonstrate success.

60723ab0-7929-426c-b59a-435b1f291874.description: Earners of the Performance & Development Cycle Foundational credential have built the knowledge and skills needed to support their team, and provide feedback and recognition on performance and development. Skills include: goal setting, career conversations, progress conversations, and effective year-end reviews.
60723ab0-7929-426c-b59a-435b1f291874.name: Performance & Development Cycle (PDC) Foundational

badge_template_activities.title: Satisfactory completion of 4 modules over 12 month timeframe. The learning journey includes knowledge, skills, and self reflection and leaners demonstrate mastery of the content by executing the PDC processes in their role over the course of the year.

1d986b50-1571-4094-bb66-122396be842c.description: Employees who have successfully completed ADP Canada have learned foundational technical insurance skills and Problem-solving methodology and applied these to solve a business problem. They are competent in skills such as business, data and financial analysis, problem solving, synthesizing data, creating a business proposal, and presenting skills.
1d986b50-1571-4094-bb66-122396be842c.name: ADP (Accelerated Development Program) Canada

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 30 hours of technical insurance and professional development workshop modules plus attend monthly mentoring sessions with assigned mentor.

Working within a smaller team, complete a business challenge assignment using problem-solving methodology and present a proposal to a panel of judges consisting of senior managers. Assessment Criteria: proposal must demonstrate problem-solving methodology approach, good presentation skills, and solution should benefit Zurich Canada.
Complete a volunteer assignment of 6 - 8 hours in length.

15432f28-8eca-409d-aeb6-c500cda99361.description: Employees who have successfully completed LEAP Canada have learned fundamental leadership skills and Design Think methodology and applied these to solve a business problem. They are competent in skills such as business, data and financial analysis, creative solutioning, synthesizing information, creating a business proposal, and presenting skills.
15432f28-8eca-409d-aeb6-c500cda99361.name: LEAP (Leadership Engagement Program) Canada

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 hours of leadership related workshop modules plus attend monthly mentoring sessions with assigned mentor.

Working within a smaller team, complete a business challenge assignment and present a proposal to a panel of judges consisting of Canadian Exco members. Assessment Criteria: proposal must be well-researched, idea well-tested, content must be well-organized and all team members prepared to respond to questions and challenges.
Complete a volunteer assignment of 6 - 8 hours in length.

3a87ab26-d385-4246-a0d5-8eaade8b5492.description: Zurich Internal Coaches have developed the skills necessary to effectively coach employees and managers for development of their career and skills. They are competent in guiding individuals to insights they may not have discovered on their own.
3a87ab26-d385-4246-a0d5-8eaade8b5492.name: Zurich Internal Coach

badge_template_activities.title: 6 hours of coach training through Inside Out Development
3 hours of observed formal practice with feedback

e099fec9-d8e2-4df4-a98e-980983b82315.description: Earners have successfully completed the Bar Raiser Behavior-Based Interview training provided through Zurich in partnership with Propel (Talogy).
e099fec9-d8e2-4df4-a98e-980983b82315.name: Bar Raiser: Behavior-Based Interviewing

badge_template_activities.title: End-to-end process training on all elements of the behavior-based interview. The course is delivered virtually (half-day or full day) and contains training curriculum and an applied learning experience (mock interview and feedback sessions).

d6050fdd-05f7-4881-8db5-77ddb81b0dcf.description: Recognizes employees by their Zurich colleagues for their outstanding leadership achievements. The award honors the four colleagues we lost on 9/11.
d6050fdd-05f7-4881-8db5-77ddb81b0dcf.name: KAMP Award

badge_template_activities.title: Criteria includes: Leadership and motivation of others to create a brighter future; Extraordinary care and passion for their work at Zurich; Standing up for what is right and delivering on our promises; Exemplifies Zurich  values while supporting a culture of inclusion and belonging

d024db4b-1ee6-4a22-bcfd-26355cbdd8a9.description: Zurich Internal Coaches - Level 2 have attained the Zurich Internal Coach Badge and mastery in coaching through frequent application of coaching skills paired with actionable feedback. These coaches are skilled at guiding individuals to self-discovery that maximizes their potential.
d024db4b-1ee6-4a22-bcfd-26355cbdd8a9.name: Zurich Internal Coach - Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Zurich Internal Coach status plus 50 hours of training, practice, and coaching. Must also have ability to provide feedback to other coaches and receive 4 out of 5 feedback scores from coachees.
